name: paint thief
description:
You love paintings.

And who doesn't? 

Paintings can be beautiful, raw, evoking and expressive.

But, you seem to love them a bit too much. 

Your house is your own sort of gallery, full of paintings from friends and strangers.

You might have to confront your actions when your friend invites you to the local gallery though....

—————————                                   —————————

This is a very short bitsy project that was made in a few hours (around 5-6.) 

I hope you enjoy!
